alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jones; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bibb, Twiggs and southeastern Jones Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was centered near Postell, or 7 miles northeast of Macon, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Jeffersonville, Marion, Postell, Bullard, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Fitzpatrick, Ripley, Huber, Cross Keys, District Path, Dry Branch, Myricks Mill and Franklinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
